data.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Four Pro Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Season Four Pro Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four as they are released PLUS the Pro version of each table for the greatly discounted price of $39.99- that’s 60% off the price of buying them separately!

Season Four includes The Addams Family®, Starship troopers™, Phantom of the Opera™, Party Zone™, Earthshaker™, Cyclone™, Jack*Bot™, Xenon, Red and Ted's Roadshow™, and Safe Cracker™.
data.about_the_game:
The Season Four Pro Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four as they are released PLUS the Pro version of each table for the greatly discounted price of $39.99- that’s 60% off the price of buying them separately!

Season Four includes The Addams Family®, Starship troopers™, Phantom of the Opera™, Party Zone™, Earthshaker™, Cyclone™, Jack*Bot™, Xenon, Red and Ted's Roadshow™, and Safe Cracker™.
data.short_description: The Season Four Pro Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four as they are released PLUS the Pro version of each table for the greatly discounted price of $39.99- that’s 60% off the price of buying them separately!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
